nodes.bodyText: I think default value with localhost and fixed port may be misleading (if there's another bootstrap running there but it's not the target one), probably it's better to fail with an exception if the property is not configured, wdyt?
typo, change ElasticSearch by Kafka broker

Missing ProducerConfig.CLIENT_ID_CONFIG property.
From Confluent documentation: Although not required, you should always set a client.id since this allows you to easily correlate requests on the broker with the client instance which made it.
Could you add any other rainy test for coverage? e.g. pass data null or empty or provoke an exception at send
